verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: the NFL is " doing the right thing " with a policy banning kneeling during the national anthem] .
President Donald Trump says the NFL [V: is] " doing the right thing " with a policy banning kneeling during the national anthem .
President Donald Trump says [ARG0: the NFL] is " [V: doing] [ARG1: the right thing] " [ARGM-MNR: with a policy banning kneeling during the national anthem] .
President Donald Trump says the NFL is " doing the right thing " with [ARG0: a policy] [V: banning] [ARG1: kneeling during the national anthem] .
President Donald Trump says the NFL is " doing the right thing " with a policy banning [V: kneeling] [ARGM-TMP: during the national anthem] .
